summary: Are you sick of looking like you\'re goind to kill everyone at first sight? Do you want to look like a \"Good Guy\" and still have a Daedric armor rating? Or mabye you just want to look godly. Whatever it may be, this mod is probably exactly what you are looking for! This mod adds a set of \"Holy\" daedric armor and weapons to the wonderful world o
descriptionHtml:
[size=6] [color=red] READ BELOW FIRST [/color] [/size]

[color=yellow] Please do not use that green \"Download with Mod Manager\" button under the Endorsements counter. You have to go to the downloads and get the \"Data\" file and your desired update of the mod. Should work with Nexus Mod Manager, just get your downloads from the files section. [/color]

Ok, now you can download :)

The cuirass + weapon textures are by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/491040] 3rd3m [/url] (He also made the original gauntlets, boots and helmet textures and I edited them and added that fancy gold :)
And the blue glow is made by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2498036] cancrena [/url]

I made this armor set plainly because I wanted daedric armor, but I wanted to look more, \"peaceful\" not so threatening. Recipes are pretty much the same as their Daedric equivalent, but instead of ebony ingot, they require a white ebony ingot and (possibly) a gold ingot. The required Daedra heart has been replaced with a new \"Frozen daedric heart\" witch can be made with a cooking pot.

All of the weapons have the same stats as the \"Dragonbone\" weapons from Dawnguard.

Recipes:

Cooking Pot:
Frozen Daedra Heart: 1x Daedra Heart, 1x Frost Salts

Smelter:
White Ebony Ingot: 1x Ebony Ore, 1x Moonstone Ore

Forge:
Holy Armor: 1x Frozen Daedra Heart, 3x White Ebony Ingot, 3x Leather Strips, 2x Gold Ingot
Holy Arrow (24): 1x Frozen Daedra heart, 1x Gold Ingot, 1x Firewood
Holy Battleaxe: 3x White Ebony Ingot, 2x Leather Strips, 1x Frozen Daedra heart, 2x Gold Ingot
Holy Boots: 2x Leather Strips, 2x White Ebony Ingot, 1x Frozen Daedra heart, 1x Gold Ingot
Holy Bow: 2x White Ebony Ingot, 1x Frozen Daedra heart, 1x Gold Ingot
Holy Dagger: 1x White Ebony Ingot, 1x Leather Strips, 1x Frozen Daedra heart, 1x Gold Ingot
Holy Gauntlets: 2x Leather Strips, 1x White Ebony Ingot, 1x Frozen Daedra Heart, 1x Gold Ingot
Holy Greatsword: 3x White Ebony Ingot, 3x Leather Strips, 1x Frozen Daedra Heart, 2x Gold Ingot
Holy Helmet: 1x Frozen Daedra Heart, 2x White Ebony Ingot, 2x Leather Strips, 1x Gold Ingot
Holy Mace: 1x White Ebony Ingot, 1x Leather Strips, 1x Frozen Daedra Heart, 1x Gold Ingot
Holy Shield: 1x Leather Strips, 1x Frozen Daedra Heart, 2x Gold Ingot, 2x White Ebony Ingot
Holy Sword: 1x White Ebony Ingot, 1x Leather Strips, 1x Frozen Daedra Heart, 1x Gold Ingot
Holy War Axe: 1x White Ebont Ingot, 2x Leather Strips, 1x Frozen Daedra Heart, 1x Gold Ingot
Holy Warhammer: 3x White Ebony Ingot, 3x Leather Strips, 1x Frozen Daedra Heart, 2x Gold Ingot

All tempering recipes require 1x White Ebony Ingot for each piece.
author: SONNYSPAK
